name: The Adventures of Sunshine's Farm
description:
Join the Farming Adventure on top of sky!

Grow vegetables and don't let the clouds to stop the sunlight to stop you from growing vegetables, rotate the Farm land to dodge the clouds. Use different Farming Tools to speed up the growing process of the vegetables and make it more efficient. Choose different Characters to play with, Customize them with different skins. Beat different challenges in different levels. Unlock new Skins, Vegetables, Tools and so on.

More new stories will come with more new Enemies, Game play, Characters, Vegetables and Levels as the Adventure continues.

Early Access

This is an Early access game which means it's still in development and everything is subject to change. Your early support in the game will help ensure the better quality of the end product. This is an early access price, the cost will increase as more features are added. If you buy it now, you will receive all future versions for free. Please join our Community and give us your feedback to help the development of this game.

Support the development of this game by getting it on Early Access.

System requirements:

OS: Windows 7/8/10

Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Series Card or Higher
